```{r setup, include=FALSE}
map_plot <- read.csv("LatandLong.csv")
map_plot
map_plot <- na.omit(map_plot)
map_plot
```

```{r 1, include=FALSE}
install.packages("sf")
```

```{r 2, include=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(ggplot2)
map_plot <- as.data.frame(map_plot)
my_map <- st_as_sf(map_plot, coords = c('Longitude', 'Latitude'))


#Plot it:

ggplot(my_map) + 
  geom_sf(aes(color = "green"))
```
